_sText:
This prefab shows the usage of the entity env_fade.

What does this entity?
----------------------


This entity blocks the players view and fades to a colour you wish.


In this prefab I show how to use this entity and timed it perfectly for that geometry.
If you want to build something like this in your map, be carefull and adjust the time settings.

I think it's pretty selfexplaining, but if you got some questions, feel free to ask.


Dotty


Valve Developer Wiki: [CLICK ME](https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Env_fade "https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Env_fade")
